channel.title: Plz help me im stuck with ham
channel.description:
i have asked this question many times now but i still dont understand how to use hamach so if some1 could give me a step by step tut on how to use it that would be great
tytyty

item.title: Plz help me im stuck with ham
item.dc:creator: @hottrodd09 hottrodd09
item.description:
@hottrodd09 wrote:

ya what e0n said thats the way other people can get on your server and the server has to be running with mod taharoks perfect compiler. to the that when it pops up press r and then press enter where it says your port and on your hamachi at the top it says your ip. For example: lets say the numbers at the top were 5.152.394.27. that would be the ip other poeple have to type in to get to your server. hope that clears the rest of it!

Read full topic
item.source: Plz help me im stuck with ham

item.title: Plz help me im stuck with ham
item.dc:creator: @e0n e0n™
item.description:
@e0n wrote:

hamachi is prity simple:

Here is what you can do with it:

You can either create a hamachi server by goin to the little triangle icon and click, Create a network (or somin like that). Or you could join a nework (or server) by putting in their pass word and name, usually give in their server adverts.

You can also instant message with the program, by right-clicking on the person you want to talk to, and clicking “Chat”. if somone is tryin to i.m. you, there will be a flashing speech bubble icon next to their name, and you will hear a popping sound.

Hope this little mini-tut helped…

Read full topic
